member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme
member.summary: Used to specify the compression schemed used in the resulting tiff image of the component.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme.None
member.summary: Specifies no compression.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme.Rle
member.summary: Specifies the RLE compression scheme

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme.Ccitt3
member.summary: Specifies the CCITT3 compression scheme.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme.Ccitt4
member.summary: Specifies the CCITT4 compression scheme.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme.Lzw
member.summary: Specifies the LZW compression scheme. This compression can be used for for 1, 4, and 8 bit color depths.

member.summary: ActiveReports Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Export Component.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.TiffExport.CompressionScheme
member.summary: Specifies the compression scheme to be used when exporting a TIFF file.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.TiffExport.Dither
member.summary: Specifies whether the image should be dithered when saving to a black and white output format such as CCITT3. If is RLE or None (indicating color output) this property has no effect.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.TiffExport.DpiX
member.summary: Get or set the horizonal resolution value when exporting a TIFF.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.TiffExport.DpiY
member.summary: Get or set the vertical resolution value when exporting a TIFF.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.TiffExport.Pagination
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicates should pagination be used for resulted TIFF document or not

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.TiffExport.CommonExport(GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Document.SectionDocument,System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Performs the export logic for a document that is common to all of the export method overloads.
member.param: The Document to be exported.
The range of pages within the document to be exported, can be null or string.empty.
The destination stream for the TIFF output.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.TiffExport.ScalePage(System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32,GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Tiff.Section.CompressionScheme,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines the scaled size of the target page based on the specified page width, height and compression scheme.
member.param: The horizontal resolution used to convert from inches to pixels.
The vertical resolution used to convert from inches to pixels.
If landscape is true this function will assume you want to flip the pageWidth/pageHeight values. The page will be scaled as if the pageWidth is the pageHeight and pageHeight is the pageWidth.
member.remarks: At least some CCITT3 devices require that the output image conform to specific resolutions. The page resolution should be 1728 wide 2376 heigh (pixels). I did see one mention of this in the "COMMON-ISDN-API Part 1, Version 2.0". See http://www.capi.org. CCITT is now www.itu.int/www.itu.org, but we have to pay 3K to read the spec :S

member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings
member.summary: Represents settings for .

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.#ctor(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes new instance of class with specified settings.
member.param: of specified settings.
FPL flag

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.Pagination
member.summary: By default, each page of a report is rendered as a separate image. Set this value to False to render the entire report as a single image.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.ImageType
member.summary: Select the type of image to which you want to render the report. Supported types are BMP, GIF, JPEG, TIFF, and PNG.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.MarginLeft
member.summary: Set the value in inches to use for the left margin of the image. The format is an integer or decimal with "in" as the suffix, for example "1in" for 1 inch. By default, no margins are used. The value set in this property overrides the report's settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.MarginTop
member.summary: Set the value in inches to use for the top margin of the image. The format is an integer or decimal with "in" as the suffix, for example "1in" for 1 inch. By default, no margins are used. The value set in this property overrides the report's settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.MarginRight
member.summary: Set the value in inches to use for the right margin of the image. The format is an integer or decimal with "in" as the suffix, for example "1in" for 1 inch. By default, no margins are used. The value set in this property overrides the report's settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.MarginBottom
member.summary: Set the value in inches to use for the bottom margin of the image. The format is an integer or decimal with "in" as the suffix, for example "1in" for 1 inch. By default, no margins are used. The value set in this property overrides the report's settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.DpiX
member.summary: Adjust the horizontal resolution of rendered images. The default value is 200.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.DpiY
member.summary: Adjust the vertical resolution of rendered images. The default value is 200.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.Compression
member.summary: Sets or returns a value which specifies the compression to be used when exporting.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.Quality
member.summary: Gets or sets the quality of the report to be rendered as an image.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.StartPage
member.summary: The default value of zero in this and the EndPage properties render all of the report pages to images. Otherwise, set this value to the number of the first page to render.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.EndPage
member.summary: The default value of 0 in this property renders all of the report pages. Otherwise, set this value to the number of the last page to render. Please note that if the StartPage property is set to 0, all of the pages of the report render. In order to use the EndPage property, you must set the StartPage property to a valid non-zero number.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.PageHeight
member.summary: Set the value in inches to use for the height of the image. The format is an integer or decimal with "in" as the suffix, for example "11in" for 11 inches. The value set in this property overrides the report's settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.PageWidth
member.summary: Set the value in inches to use for the width of the image. The format is an integer or decimal with "in" as the suffix, for example "8in" for 8 inches. The value set in this property overrides the report's settings.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.WatermarkTitle
member.summary: Sets text (i.e. CONFIDENTIAL) to use as the watermark on the image.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.WatermarkAngle
member.summary: Specify the degree of angle for the watermark text on the image. Valid values range from 0 to 359, where 0 is horizontal, left to right.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.WatermarkFont
member.summary: Set the font to use for the watermark to any valid System.Drawing.Font.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.WatermarkColor
member.summary: Select a color for the watermark text on the image. The default value for the watermark color is gray, but you can select any Web, System, or Custom color.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.PrintLayoutMode
member.summary: Select how to lay out the pages of the report in the image.

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Page.Settings.SizeToFit
member.summary: By default, rendered report pages are not resized to fit within the selected image size. Set this value to True to resize the report pages.

members.member: Specifies whether the image should be dithered when saving to a black and white output format, like CCITT3 or Rle. This property has no effect if the CompressionScheme property is set to Lzw or None(represents color output).

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Select how to lay out the pages of the report in the image..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_MarginBottom
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enter a value in inches (i.e. 0.5in) for the space between the bottom of the report and the edge of the page. This overrides the report's original settings..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_MarginLeft
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enter a value in inches (i.e. 0.5in) for the space between the left edge of the report and the edge of the page. This overrides the report's original settings..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_MarginRight
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enter a value in inches (i.e. 0.5in) for the space between the right edge of the report and the edge of the page. This overrides the report's original settings..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_MarginTop
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enter a value in inches (i.e. 0.5in) for the space between the top of the report and the edge of the page. This overrides the report's original settings..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_PageHeight
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enter a value in inches (i.e. 11in) to set the height of the report's pages. This value overrides the report's original settings..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_PageWidth
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enter a value in inches (i.e. 8.5in) to set the width of the report's pages. This value overrides the report's original settings..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_Pagination
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Set this value to False to render the entire report as a single image. A value of True renders each page of the report as a separate image..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_Quality
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specify the quality to use for a report rendered as a JPEG image. Values range from 1 to 100 percent..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_SizeToFit
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Set this value to True to resize the report pages. A value of False does not resize the pages to fit the selected PageHeight and Width..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_StartPage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The default value of zero in this and the EndPage properties render all of the report pages. Otherwise, set this value to the number of the first page to render..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_WatermarkAngle
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specify the degree of angle for the watermark text on the image. Valid values range from 0 to 359, where 0 is horizontal, left to right..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_WatermarkColor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Select a color for the watermark text on the image. The default value for the watermark color is gray, but you can select any Web, System, or Custom color..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_WatermarkFont
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Click the + or the ellipsis to set the font properties for the watermark text on the image, or enter any valid System.Drawing.Font..

member.name: P:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Export.Image.Resources.Image_WatermarkTitle
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enter text (i.e. CONFIDENTIAL) to use as the watermark on the image..
